import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; function Speakers() { const [speakers, setSpeakers] = useState([]); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(""); const [filteredSpeakers, setFilteredSpeakers] = useState([]); const { id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { axios .get("http://localhost:4000/viewspaker") .then((response) => { setSpeakers(response.data); setFilteredSpeakers(response.data); }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); }, []); const handleSearch = (e) => { const query = e.target.value; setSearchQuery(query); filterSpeakers(query); }; const filterSpeakers = (query) => { const filtered = speakers.filter((speaker) => { const name = speaker.name || ''; // Assign an empty string if speaker.name is undefined return ( name.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase()) || description.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase()) ); }); setFilteredSpeakers(filtered); }; return(
